name: Smoochum
rules: If this Baby Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and your opponent announces an attack, your opponent flips a coin (before doing anything else). If tails, your opponent's turn ends.

attacks.name: Psykiss
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose a Special Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. Your opponent shuffles that card into his or her deck.

flavorText: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and forwards as if it is trying to kiss someone.
